roleset.name: elect someone to an office or position, elect
roleset.note: ELECT-V NOTES: I so want to make an "electile dysfunction" joke here. (from elect.01-v)
ELECTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry elect.01, OntoNotes sense groupings election.01, election.02, election.03; maps to VN entry appoint-29.1. Framed by Claire (from election.01-n)

roles.note: Be careful to distinguish candidate from office. (from election.01-n)

example.name: hey, whaddya know, it does occur in the active voice
example.text: Holders at the meeting elected a full slate of Canadian Express nominees to Enfield's 11-member board.
example.arg: a full slate of Canadian Express nominees

example.name: No voter, NP only
example.text: Mr. Johnson 's election as a director

example.name: 'To' preposition
example.text: We celebrated Bob's election to the state senate.

example.name: Choice rather than true vote, with decider
example.src: Choice rather than true vote, with decider
example.type: Choice rather than true vote, with decider
example.text: Mary's election of medicine as a profession pleased her father.

example.name: Choice, immediate gratification
example.text: The children's election to eat their chocolate now means they won't get dessert later.

example.name: True election, no numbered args
example.text: People believe the election in Italy will be very close.

example.name: Second term as office
example.text: His election to a second term was quite frustrating for some.

roleset.name: choose an action or thing
roleset.note: ELECT-V NOTES: comparable to choose.01 (from elect.02-v)
ELECT-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from elect.02-n)

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Rather than turn back from such a vital mission, he elected to proceed to the target.
example.arg: Rather than turn back from such a vital mission

roleset.name: of or relating to elctions
roleset.note: ELECTORAL-J NOTES: Based on ontonotes data. (from electoral.01-j)

roleset.name: relating to or composed of electors
capable of being elected by voters
roleset.note: ELECTABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, elect.01. (from electable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: I checked Cullen because he is most electable -LRB- that is , most likely to attract independent voters -RRB- .
example.arg: that is, most likely to attract independent voters
